title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Pandemic-Based Educational Method Changes and Student Satisfaction Correlation Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in online educational tools and blended learning experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: The impact of changes in technology-supported educational methods on student satisfaction during the pandemic can be explained through three or more indicators.
The strengths, weaknesses, and satisfaction linkages of blended learning models can be analyzed through VR simulation case studies.
Methods for collecting and interpreting online education satisfaction data in limited technological environments can be applied.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
